description:
exp/wingui: getting relocated to

go get code.google.com/p/gowingui

messages.text: Please add a few words to go1.{tmpl,html}

On 2012/03/07 05:06:27, minux wrote:
> I think this has a side effect of advertising people to use
> mksyscall_windows.pl
> in their programs.
> 

I am not planing to change it at this time. But, if you have better solution, feel free to change. You are a commiter at go get code.google.com/p/gowingui now.

Alex

LGTM http://codereview.appspot.com/5752067/diff/5002/doc/go1.tmpl File doc/go1.tmpl (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5752067/diff/5002/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode661 doc/go1.tmpl:661: Go 1 has moved a number of packages into sub-repositories of s/into/into other repositories, usually/ see below http://codereview.appspot.com/5752067/diff/5002/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode709 doc/go1.tmpl:709: exp/wingui code.google.com/p/gowingui this one is not really a subrepo, but that's ok.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, minux.ma@gmail.com, r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

I think this has a side effect of advertising people to use
mksyscall_windows.pl
in their programs.

I remembered someone (sorry I forget the name of the thread) don't
recommend use
that for generating syscall boilerplate outside the main Go tree.
(I mean, if we have an external repo using that feature, we should document
it)

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=abf39116ffac ***

exp/wingui: getting relocated to

go get code.google.com/p/gowingui

R=golang-dev, minux.ma, r
CC=golang-dev
